_header: Mans word first is in heart thought
_description: The power of speech — six rhyming lines in a Latin homily

OxfBal149.Transcription:
Mannys worde fyrst is in herte thoughtAfter hit is to speche
                    brought& þen hit is in ded wroughtfor as manȝ mannes
                    worde at onis passyth fer & duelliþ styllehit sweth forth þo
                    hert willþer ys non … cature bot man þat worde falleth
                    till
